text.autoconfig.map_atlases.title: Map Atlases Config
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.maxMa: The maximum number of Maps (Filled & Empty combined) allowed to be inside an Atlas.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.force: Scale the mini-map to a given pixel size.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.drawM: If 'true', the Mini-Map of the Active Map will be drawn on the HUD while the Atlas is active.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.enabl: If 'true', Atlases will be able to store Empty Maps and auto-fill them as you explore.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.activ: Controls location where mini-map displays. Any of: 'HANDS', 'HOTBAR', or 'INVENTORY'.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.force: Scale the world-map to a given % of the height of your screen.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.miniM: Set to any of 'Upper'/'Lower' & 'Left'/'Right' to control anchor position of mini-map
Enter an integer which will offset the mini-map horizontally
Enter an integer which will offset the mini-map vertically
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.maxMa: The maximum number of Maps (Filled & Empty combined) allowed to be inside an Atlas.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.force: Scale the mini-map to a given % of the height of your screen.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.drawM: If 'true', the Mini-Map of the Active Map will be drawn on the HUD while the Atlas is on your hot-bar or off-hand.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.enabl: If 'true', Atlases will be able to store Empty Maps and auto-fill them as you explore.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.activ: Controls location where mini-map displays. Any of: 'HANDS', ,'HOTBAR', or 'INVENTORY'.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.force: Scale the world-map to a given pixel size.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.miniM: Set to any of 'Upper'/'Lower' & 'Left'/'Right' to control anchor position of mini-map
Enter an integer which will offset the mini-map horizontally
Enter an integer which will offset the mini-map vertically
